useCase.name: Language Selection
useCase.description: User selects the language for interaction with the system.

preconditions.precondition: Farmer initiates a call to the system.

useCase.trigger: User starts the call to the system.

mainSequence.step: System greets the Farmer and prompts to select a language.
Farmer selects a language (1 for English, 2 for French, 3 for local languages).
